iati-activity.iati-identifier: GB-COH-09288843-Addressing Maternal Nutrition and Wasting and Stunting in Under-fives in Ethiopia

title.narrative: Addressing Maternal Nutrition and Wasting and Stunting in Under-fives in Ethiopia

description.narrative: The proposed five-year US$30 million investment aims to improve maternal and child nutrition by increasing the coverage and quality of maternal and child nutrition services, includes, i) prevention/treatment of wasting, ii) deworming, iii) multiple micronutrient supplements, and iv) infant and young child nutrition interventions.
